title: Induced emf - calculated from a graph

content.question: A magnetic field directed into the page passes perpendicularly through a wire loop with a radius of <math alttext="0.25 meter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.25</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math> as shown. The magnetic field strength <math alttext="B " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>B</mi></math> as a function of time is shown in the graph. Which of the following is most nearly equal to the magnitude of the <math alttext="e m f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>emf</mtext></math> induced in the loop at <math alttext="t equals 1.5 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
